titleInfo.title: The War Cartoons of Louis Raemaekers

mods.note: 100 Illustrations with descriptive notes and a biographical sketch. The artistic drawings of political cartoonists Louis Raemaeker, both critical and celebratory of the United States are included. Criticism includes those against militarism, injustices against immigrants, and other social ills in the first part of the 20th century.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
